Daniel Montoya

    Portfolio

    About

SPECIALIZED

I chose to recreate the Specialized Website because it is a brand and company that have grown to admire and identify with. They continue to push the world of Bicycles as a whole forward and have made my personal experience with Mountain Biking more exciting and memorable. I have been riding a Specialized StumpJumper for many years and have developed a love for my bike and the sport. In addition, the Specialized Website is very clean, effective and a prime example of a modern Website.

Website Github

Building an E-Commerce Website

In todays capitalist society, E-Commerce has become an essential part of business. By building the Specialized Website I have gained invaluable experience creating an effective E-Commerce website for a global company.
